text: geudeul-ege noaui yaegileul deul lyeojula geubun-eun geuui baegseong-ege malhayeossdeola naega neohuiwa meomulleo neohuiege hananim-ui malsseum-eulo chung-goham-e neohuiga geomanhae handa hayeodo naneun hananimkke uitaghanila geuleom-eulo neohuiui il-eun neohui usang-gwa gyeoljeonghala geulihamyeon neohuiui ildeul-i ui simchi anhge doel geos-ini neohuiga wonhaneun daelo hadoe na-ege yeoyuleul jujimalla
